title: Lenovoâ€™s new IdeaPad Gaming 3 series has 165Hz displays and RTX graphics
content:
Lenovo has announced the new IdeaPad Gaming 3 series laptops at this year’s MWC. The latest models of Lenovo’s entry-level gaming laptop comes with the latest hardware from Intel (IdeaPad Gaming 3i) or AMD (IdeaPad Gaming 3). The Lenovo IdeaPad Gaming 3i comes with 12th-generation Intel Core H-series processors, up to a Core i7-12700H, while

The post Lenovo’s new IdeaPad Gaming 3 series has 165Hz displays and RTX graphics appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Lenovo has announced the new IdeaPad Gaming 3 series, powered by Intel and AMD's latest processors and featuring NVIDIA RTX graphics.
